Constipation
You may become constipated 
very early in pregnancy 
because of the hormonal 
changes taking place in your 
body.
How to avoid constipation
• Eat foods that are high 
in	fibre,	like	wholemeal	
breads, wholegrain cereals, 
fruit and vegetables, and 
pulses such as beans and 
lentils.
• Exercise regularly to keep 
your muscles toned.
• Drink plenty of water.
• Avoid iron supplements. 
Ask your doctor
